sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import Badge from './Badge';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"badge"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#badge"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Badge`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`알림 개수를 알리기 유용한 컴포넌트입니다.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={ Badge } />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<Badge count={2} />
<Badge count={101} />`} __scope={{props,Badge}}>
  <Badge count={ 2 } />
  <Badge count={ 101 } />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-diffrent-colors"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-diffrent-colors"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With diffrent colors`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<Badge count={2} color="black" backgroundColor="pink" />
<Badge count={2} color="pink" backgroundColor="black" />`} __scope={{props,Badge}}>
  <Badge
    count={ 2 }
    color="black"
    backgroundColor="pink"
  />
  <Badge
    count={ 2 }
    color="pink"
    backgroundColor="black"
  />
</Playground></MDXTag>
